channel.title: Compiler Fix
channel.description:
Damn, i see so many topics with;
oh noes, my compiler says i need jdk when i already have it or oh noes, what do you mean the file is not found
[b][size=20pt]SO, HERE IS THE SOLUTION:[/size][/b]
Make a new .txt in your sources folder Name the first one compiler.txt
then add this to it: [code]@echo off title [server name here] Compiler javac *.java pause[/code]
Now save it as a [b][size=15pt].bat file[/size][/b]
[b]NEXT[/b]
Make another .txt Name it runserver.txt add this to it: [code] @echo off title Server java -Xmx512m -splash:splash.jpg -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server 4545 [/code]
[b][size=15pt]SAVE IT AS A .BAT[/size][/b]
Now, run compiler.bat to compile and runserver.bat to run your server :D

item.title: Compiler Fix
item.dc:creator: @anelm anelm
item.description:
@anelm wrote:

hehehe yee i dont know why people were having problems with that… the first perfect complier i used worked for me… It complied perfectly. But eh, I just tried this method and it works fine too.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Fix
item.dc:creator: @Strangex0rz Strangex0rz
item.description:
@Strangex0rz wrote:

Damn, i see so many topics with;

oh noes, my compiler says i need jdk when i already have it
or
oh noes, what do you mean the file is not found

[size=20pt]SO, HERE IS THE SOLUTION:[/size]

Make a new .txt in your sources folder
Name the first one compiler.txt

then add this to it:

@echo off title [server name here] Compiler javac *.java pause

Now save it as a [size=15pt].bat file[/size]

NEXT

Make another .txt
Name it runserver.txt
add this to it:

@echo off
title Server
java -Xmx512m -splash:splash.jpg -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server 4545

[size=15pt]SAVE IT AS A .BAT[/size]

Now, run compiler.bat to compile
and runserver.bat to run your server

Read full topic
